description: Get an aggregation of service statistics defined by a specific time range.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start of the time frame for which to aggregate statistics.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time frame for which to aggregate statistics.

nested_items.name: TimeSeriesServiceStatistics
nested_items.description: The collection of statistics.

nested_items.name: Timestamp
nested_items.description: Timestamp of the window for which statistics are aggregated.

nested_items.name: EdgeSummaryStatistics
nested_items.description: Response statistics for an edge.

nested_items.name: OkCount
nested_items.description: The number of requests that completed with a 2xx Success status code.

nested_items.name: ErrorStatistics
nested_items.description: Information about requests that failed with a 4xx Client Error status code.

nested_items.name: ThrottleCount
nested_items.description: The number of requests that failed with a 429 throttling status code.

nested_items.name: OtherCount
nested_items.description: The number of requests that failed with untracked 4xx Client Error status codes.

nested_items.name: TotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of requests that failed with a 4xx Client Error status code.

nested_items.name: FaultStatistics
nested_items.description: Information about requests that failed with a 5xx Server Error status code.

nested_items.name: OtherCount
nested_items.description: The number of requests that failed with untracked 5xx Server Error status codes.

nested_items.name: TotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of requests that failed with a 5xx Server Error status code.

nested_items.name: TotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of completed requests.

nested_items.name: TotalResponseTime
nested_items.description: The aggregate response time of completed requests.

nested_items.name: ServiceSummaryStatistics
nested_items.description: Response statistics for a service.

nested_items.name: OkCount
nested_items.description: The number of requests that completed with a 2xx Success status code.

nested_items.name: ErrorStatistics
nested_items.description: Information about requests that failed with a 4xx Client Error status code.

nested_items.name: ThrottleCount
nested_items.description: The number of requests that failed with a 429 throttling status code.

nested_items.name: OtherCount
nested_items.description: The number of requests that failed with untracked 4xx Client Error status codes.

nested_items.name: TotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of requests that failed with a 4xx Client Error status code.

nested_items.name: FaultStatistics
nested_items.description: Information about requests that failed with a 5xx Server Error status code.

nested_items.name: OtherCount
nested_items.description: The number of requests that failed with untracked 5xx Server Error status codes.

nested_items.name: TotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of requests that failed with a 5xx Server Error status code.

nested_items.name: TotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of completed requests.

nested_items.name: TotalResponseTime
nested_items.description: The aggregate response time of completed requests.

nested_items.name: ServiceForecastStatistics
nested_items.description: The forecasted high and low fault count values.

nested_items.name: FaultCountHigh
nested_items.description: The upper limit of fault counts for a service.

nested_items.name: FaultCountLow
nested_items.description: The lower limit of fault counts for a service.

nested_items.name: ResponseTimeHistogram
nested_items.description: The response time histogram for the selected entities.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the entry.

nested_items.name: Count
nested_items.description: The prevalence of the entry.

nested_items.name: ContainsOldGroupVersions
nested_items.description: A flag indicating whether or not a group's filter expression has been consistent, or if a returned aggregation might show statistics from an older version of the group's filter expression.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Pagination token.
